skills.name: biz-product-brief
skills.description: Produce a concise product brief artifact that is decision-ready, scoped, and measurable.

skills.name: biz-spreadsheet
skills.description: Define an operations spreadsheet deliverable with schema, formula logic, ownership, and a starter CSV template.

skills.name: biz-update-people
skills.description: Update People doc based on code attribution, reflection learnings, and role changes.

skills.name: biz-update-plan
skills.description: Update Business Plan based on standing-pipeline evidence, card reflections, and strategic decisions.

skills.name: draft-email
skills.description: Draft a decision-ready outbound or response email artifact with channel-safe structure, clear CTA, and review checklist.

skills.name: draft-marketing
skills.description: Create channel-specific marketing asset drafts with clear positioning, CTA, and measurable campaign intent.

skills.name: draft-outreach
skills.description: Draft sales and partnership outreach scripts (DMs, cold emails, follow-ups, objection handlers) for 1:1 relationship building.

skills.name: draft-whatsapp
skills.description: Draft WhatsApp-ready business messages with concise structure, clear CTA, and compliance-aware guardrails.

skills.name: guide-translate
skills.description: Propagate updated EN guide content to all locales using parallel translation. Requires EN audit to be clean first.

skills.name: idea-scan
skills.description: Analyze standing-intelligence pack diffs and produce scan-proposals.md for IDEAS-02 backlog updates.

skills.name: ideas-go-faster
skills.description: Radical business growth process auditor. Cabinet Secretary orchestrates multi-lens composite idea generation with attribution, confidence gating, and priority ranking.

skills.name: lp-assessment-bootstrap
skills.description: Bootstrap a <YYYY-MM-DD>-brand-identity-dossier.user.md for a business entering the startup loop. Gathers context from strategy docs, existing UI, and theme packages, then fills the shared template. Used at S0/S1 when the doc is missing, or at DO before /lp-design-spec.

skills.name: lp-baseline-merge
skills.description: Join parallel fan-out outputs (MARKET-06 + S3 + SELL-01, with optional PRODUCT-02) into a single baseline snapshot and draft manifest.

skills.name: lp-brand-refresh
skills.description: `/lp-brand-refresh` is a standalone brand context refresh skill. It updates brand strategy and visual identity documents independently of the ASSESSMENT sequence.

skills.name: lp-channels
skills.description: Startup channel strategy + GTM skill (SELL-01). Analyzes channel-customer fit, selects 2-3 launch channels with rationale, and produces a 30-day GTM timeline. Consumes lp-offer output (ICP, positioning, objections) and feeds channel selection to draft-marketing and lp-seo.

skills.name: lp-coverage-scan
skills.description: Coverage gap scanner for startup loop. Reads a business coverage manifest, scans the repo and known integrations for actual artifact/data-source state, classifies gaps as CRITICAL/MAJOR/MINOR, writes a gap report, and emits dispatch packets to queue-state.json for all CRITICAL and MAJOR gaps.

skills.name: lp-design-qa
skills.description: Audit a built UI against the design spec and design system for visual consistency (code-level), accessibility, responsive behavior, and token compliance. Produces structured issues ready for lp-do-build fixes.

skills.name: lp-design-spec
skills.description: Translate a feature requirement into a concrete frontend design specification mapped to the design system, theme tokens, and per-business brand language. Sits between fact-find and plan.

skills.name: lp-design-system
skills.description: Apply design tokens and system patterns correctly. Reference for semantic colors, spacing, typography, borders, and shadows. Never use arbitrary values.

skills.name: lp-do-assessment-01-problem-statement
skills.description: Problem framing for new startups (ASSESSMENT-01). Produces a falsifiable problem statement artifact before entering ASSESSMENT intake. Upstream of lp-do-assessment-02-solution-profiling.

skills.name: lp-do-assessment-02-solution-profiling
skills.description: Solution space scanning for new startups (ASSESSMENT-02). Produces a structured deep-research-ready prompt covering 5-10 candidate product-type options with feasibility flags. Feasibility only — no demand scoring until S2.

skills.name: lp-do-assessment-03-solution-selection
skills.description: Solution selection gate for new startups (ASSESSMENT-03). Reads solution-space research results, builds an evaluation matrix, and produces a shortlist of 1-2 options with elimination rationale. Explicit kill gate — decision record required to continue to ASSESSMENT-04.

skills.name: lp-do-assessment-04-candidate-names
skills.description: Full naming pipeline orchestrator (ASSESSMENT-04). Runs four parts in sequence: (1) produce <YYYY-MM-DD>-naming-generation-spec.md from ASSESSMENT docs, (2) agent generates 250 scored candidates, (3) RDAP batch check all .com domains, (4) filter to available names and produce ranked shortlist. Delivers a final operator-ready shortlist of domain-verified, scored brand name candidates.

skills.name: lp-do-assessment-05-name-selection
skills.description: Produce a <YYYY-MM-DD>-naming-generation-spec.md for a business. Reads ASSESSMENT stage docs, extracts ICP, product, brand personality, competitive set, and any prior eliminated names, then writes a fully-structured agent-executable spec that generates 250 scored candidate names. Part 1 of a 4-part naming pipeline (spec → generate → RDAP batch check → rank).

skills.name: lp-do-assessment-06-distribution-profiling
skills.description: Distribution profiling for new startups (ASSESSMENT-06). Elicits ≥2 launch channels with cost/effort estimates and ICP fit rationale. Produces a distribution-plan artifact ready for measurement profiling. Upstream of lp-do-assessment-07-measurement-profiling.

skills.name: lp-do-assessment-07-measurement-profiling
skills.description: Measurement profiling for new startups (ASSESSMENT-07). Elicits tracking setup, ≥2 key metrics, success thresholds, and data collection feasibility. Produces a measurement-plan artifact ready for current situation capture. Upstream of lp-do-assessment-08-current-situation.

skills.name: lp-do-assessment-08-current-situation
skills.description: Elicits and records what the operator directly knows about the business before ASSESSMENT intake runs. Captures launch surface, inventory/product readiness, commercial architecture, and pre-locked cha

skills.name: lp-do-assessment-10-brand-profiling
skills.description: Brand profiling for new startups (ASSESSMENT-10). Confirms business name, defines audience, personality, and voice & tone. Produces brand-strategy artifact ready for visual identity work. Upstream of lp-do-assessment-11-brand-identity.

skills.name: lp-do-assessment-11-brand-identity
skills.description: Visual brand identity for new startups (ASSESSMENT-11). Reads brand-strategy artifact and produces brand-dossier with colour palette, typography, imagery direction, and token overrides. Upstream of S1.

skills.name: lp-do-assessment-12-promote
skills.description: Brand dossier promotion gate (ASSESSMENT-12). Validates completeness of a Draft brand dossier and promotes to Active with operator confirmation. Lightweight gate between ASSESSMENT-11 output and lp-design-spec GATE-BD-07.

skills.name: lp-do-assessment-13-product-naming
skills.description: Full product naming pipeline orchestrator (ASSESSMENT-13). Runs four parts in sequence: (1) produce <YYYY-MM-DD>-product-naming-spec.md from ASSESSMENT docs, (2) agent generates 75 scored candidates across naming territories, (3) TM pre-screen direction for all candidates via tm-prescreen-cli.ts, (4) filter and rank to produce a top-20 shortlist. Delivers a final operator-ready shortlist of scored candidates with EUIPO/WIPO/UIBM search direction pre-generated.

skills.name: lp-do-assessment-14-logo-brief
skills.description: Logo design brief for new startups (ASSESSMENT-14). Synthesises brand identity dossier, brand profile, and product naming to produce a complete logo design brief ready to hand to a designer. Upstream of lp-do-assessment-15-packaging-brief and /lp-design-spec.

skills.name: lp-do-assessment-15-packaging-brief
skills.description: Packaging design brief for new startups (ASSESSMENT-15). Conditional on physical-product profile. Reads brand identity, product naming, logo brief, and distribution plan to produce a complete packaging brief covering structural format, regulatory requirements, surface design, and designer handoff checklist.

skills.name: lp-do-briefing
skills.description: Produce an understanding-only system briefing — how something works now, traced end-to-end with evidence pointers. No planning artifacts or tasks. Use when you need current-behavior understanding without committing to a plan.

skills.name: lp-do-build
skills.description: Thin build orchestrator. Executes one runnable task per cycle from an approved plan using canonical gates, track-specific executors, and shared ops utilities.

skills.name: lp-do-critique
skills.description: Hardnosed critic for lp-do-fact-find, lp-do-plan, lp-offer, and process/skill documents. Surfaces weak claims, missing evidence, hidden assumptions, feasibility gaps, and unaddressed risks with no glazing.

skills.name: lp-do-fact-find
skills.description: Thin orchestrator for discovery, intake routing, and evidence-first fact-finding. Routes to specialized modules and emits planning artifacts ready for /lp-do-plan. For understanding-only briefings, use /lp-do-briefing.

skills.name: lp-do-factcheck
skills.description: Verify the accuracy of statements in markdown documents by auditing the actual repository state. Directly fix inaccuracies in-place rather than producing a separate report.

skills.name: lp-do-idea-forecast
skills.description: Build a 90-day startup forecast and proposed goals from a business idea and product specs using web research (competitor analysis, price bands, channel benchmarks, demand signals). Use when a user provides idea/product inputs and wants the agent to set most targets, assumptions, risks, and validation metrics before SFS-00 or lp-do-idea-generate.

skills.name: lp-do-idea-generate
skills.description: Radical business growth process auditor. Cabinet Secretary orchestrates multi-lens composite idea generation with attribution, confidence gating, and priority ranking.

skills.name: lp-do-ideas
skills.description: Trial-mode idea orchestrator. Ingests standing-artifact delta events and emits schema-valid dispatch packets routed to lp-do-fact-find or lp-do-briefing. Trial mode only — does not mutate startup-loop stage state.

skills.name: lp-do-plan
skills.description: Thin orchestrator for confidence-gated planning. Routes to track-specific planning modules, persists plan artifacts from templates, and hands off to /lp-do-build by default unless --notauto is passed.

skills.name: lp-do-replan
skills.description: Thin orchestrator for resolving low-confidence plan tasks with evidence, explicit precursor tasks, stable task IDs, and checkpoint-aware reassessment.

skills.name: lp-do-sequence
skills.description: Topologically sort plan tasks into correct implementation order, preserve stable task IDs by default, and add explicit dependency/blocker metadata to enable parallel subagent execution.

skills.name: lp-do-worldclass
skills.description: World-class benchmark skill for startup loop. Validates a business goal artifact, generates or refreshes a deep-research prompt, and (when a benchmark result is present) scans business strategy artifacts against world-class standards, presents improvement ideas to the operator for selection, and invokes /lp-do-ideas for each selected idea.

skills.name: lp-experiment
skills.description: Startup experiment design and weekly readout for the DO/S10 build-measure-decide loop.

skills.name: lp-forecast
skills.description: S3 startup 90-day forecaster — build P10/P50/P90 scenario bands from zero operational data

skills.name: lp-guide-audit
skills.description: Run SEO audit and iteratively fix all issues for English guide content only. No translation.

skills.name: lp-guide-improve
skills.description: Main entry point for guide improvement - interactive workflow selection for audit, translation, or both

skills.name: lp-launch-qa
skills.description: Pre-launch quality assurance gate for startup loop (S9B). Validates conversion flows, SEO technical readiness, performance budget, and legal compliance before a site goes live.

skills.name: lp-measure
skills.description: Bootstrap measurement infrastructure for a startup before or just after website launch.

skills.name: lp-offer
skills.description: Startup offer design skill (MARKET-06). Consolidates ICP, positioning, pricing, and offer design into one artifact with 6 sections. Produces a validated offer hypothesis ready for forecasting and channel selection.

skills.name: lp-onboarding-audit
skills.description: Audit an app's onboarding flow against the "Onboarding Done Right" checklist. Customizes the generic checklist for the app's purpose and audience, then audits actual code using lp-do-fact-find's Outcome A process. Produces a planning-ready brief.

skills.name: lp-other-products
skills.description: Produce a deep research prompt for adjacent product range exploration. Reads the target business's startup loop docs (offer, ICP, market intel, brand dossier) and outputs a structured deep-research-ready prompt covering customer JTBD, manufacturer accessory landscape, product candidate set with one-page cards, prioritisation rubric, 90-day MVP plan, and bundling strategy.

skills.name: lp-prioritize
skills.description: Startup go-item ranking - score and select top 2-3 items to pursue

skills.name: lp-readiness
skills.description: Startup preflight gate (S1). Lightweight readiness check before entering the offer-building stage. Validates offer clarity, distribution feasibility, and measurement plan against minimal startup criteria.

skills.name: lp-refactor
skills.description: Refactor React components for better maintainability, performance, or patterns. Covers hook extraction, component splitting, type safety, memoization, and composition.

skills.name: lp-seo
skills.description: S6B phased SEO strategy skill - keyword research, content clustering, SERP analysis, technical audit, and snippet optimization for any business

skills.name: lp-signal-review
skills.description: Weekly signal strengthening review for startup loop runs. Audits a run against ten structural signal-strengthening principles, scores each on Severity × Support axes, identifies top findings, and emits a Signal Review artifact with ranked Finding Briefs (quality check — what went wrong this run) and Process-Improvement Stubs (continuous improvement — which process artifact caused it and what to change).

skills.name: lp-site-upgrade
skills.description: Build website-upgrade strategy in three layers: (1) periodic platform capability baseline, (2) per-business upgrade brief from reference sites, and (3) lp-do-fact-find handoff packet for prioritized implementation backlog. Use when upgrading an existing site by synthesizing best-of patterns with platform-fit constraints.

skills.name: lp-weekly
skills.description: S10 weekly orchestration wrapper. Coordinates the full weekly decision, audit/CI, measurement compilation, and experiment lane flows into one deterministic sequence. Additive-first; never replaces canonical S10 authorities. No new hard stage blocks in first iteration.

skills.name: meta-loop-efficiency
skills.description: Weekly startup-loop skill efficiency audit. Scans lp-* + startup-loop + draft-outreach skills with deterministic heuristics (wc-l, grep, ls), emits a ranked opportunity artifact, and fires a planning anchor only on new-to-HIGH findings.

skills.name: meta-reflect
skills.description: Capture session learnings and propose targeted improvements to docs, skills, or core agent instructions. Evidence-based only - no theoretical improvements. Closes the feedback loop directly by updating existing files.

skills.name: meta-user-test
skills.description: Run a repeatable two-layer site audit: full sitemap JS-off coverage for complete issue inventory, then focused JS-on flow checks for hydration/booking UX. Emit dated markdown+JSON artifacts with prioritized findings and acceptance criteria.

skills.name: ops-git-recover
skills.description: Recover from confusing git states. Use when git status is unexpected, commits seem lost, you have a detached HEAD, or merge conflicts are overwhelming.

skills.name: ops-inbox
skills.description: Process pending Brikette customer emails and generate draft responses using MCP tools

skills.name: ops-ship
skills.description: Ship local changes to origin/dev with hard-enforced git safety policy, integrator-shell lock/guard flow, validate-changes gating, and CI watch-fix loops until required checks pass.

skills.name: review-plan-status
skills.description: Report on the status of incomplete plans — how many tasks remain in each. Optionally lp-do-factcheck plans before reporting.

skills.name: startup-loop
skills.description: Chat command wrapper for operating Startup Loop runs. Supports /startup-loop start|status|submit|advance with strict stage gating, prompt handoff, and Business OS sync checks. Routes to lp-* stage skills at each stage.

skills.name: tool-process-audit
skills.description: Diagnose a named or described business/engineering process for bottlenecks, risks, and optimization opportunities. Use when a user asks to review, map, or improve a workflow and wants concrete next steps with effort/impact tradeoffs.

skills.name: tools-bos-design-page
skills.description: Generate or enhance HTML documentation with polished visual diagrams (Mermaid flowcharts, state machines, sequence diagrams, Chart.js dashboards). Supports multiple documents via a references directory of reusable palettes, zoom controls, and initialization patterns. Use when asked to add diagrams to a guide, visualise a system or workflow, build a KPI dashboard, or improve documentation readability with visuals.

skills.name: tools-ui-breakpoint-sweep
skills.description: Open the app at user-specified viewport widths and systematically detect responsive layout failures (overflow/bleed, clipping, misalignment, broken reflow). Produces a screenshot-backed issue log with repro steps and fix hypotheses.

skills.name: tools-ui-contrast-sweep
skills.description: At user-specified breakpoints, audit the UI for contrast failures (text/background, icons, controls, focus indicators) and visual-uniformity drift (inconsistent tokens, typography, spacing, component variants). Produces screenshot-backed findings with WCAG-aligned thresholds and fix hypotheses.

skills.name: tools-ui-frontend-design
skills.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces grounded in this repo's design system. Use when asked to build web components, pages, or applications. Combines bold creative direction with token-constrained implementation.
